lines.author: Grandma
lines.text: My my Clara, how much you've grown! Let grandma have a look at you.

lines.author: Clara
lines.text: You think so? I don't think I've grown any taller. Do you like my new dress?

lines.author: Grandma
lines.text: I love it Clara. It will go great with the present I brought you.

lines.author: Clara
lines.text: Present? You brought me a gift?

lines.author: Grandma
lines.text: Of course! It's Christmas, is it not? Here, for you.

lines.author: Clara
lines.text: A pair or earings! Oh, they are beautiful Grandma!

lines.author: Clara
lines.text: Thank you, thank you, thank you! I love you Grandma!

lines.author: Grandma
lines.text: I love you too sweetie. Now go and enjoy the party.

lines.author: Clara
lines.text: (I'm so SO happy that I was able to see grandma today and receive her gift! Thank you Grandma!)
